introduction.template: Write a concise summary in {LANG} of the Introduction. Focus on background, gap, and objective.

methods.template: Summarize in {LANG} the Methods focusing on experimental design, key materials, and core procedures.

results.template: Summarize in {LANG} this Results subsection: key findings, comparisons, and reported metrics. No speculation.

discussion.template: Summarize in {LANG} the Discussion: interpretation, implications, limitations, and main conclusion.

key_points.template: In {LANG}, produce 5–8 key bullet points capturing the paper’s main contributions and outcomes.

figure_narrative.template: In {LANG}, create a coherent narrative of the figures: what each figure shows and the overall story.
